title: Data Visualization
text:
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)




example_plot <- ggplot(data = penguins, 
                       aes(x = bill_depth_mm,
                           y = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point()

example_plot




Lets spice this up a bit by having each penguin species show up as a different color and adding a theme.



reminder: when changing something on the graph based on a variable, like point color below, it need to go inside the function aes().

example_plot <- ggplot(data = penguins, 
                       aes(x = bill_depth_mm,
                           y = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species)) +
  theme_light()

example_plot

Warning: Removed 2 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
